data:
West Leeds CLLD will:
• Consult with local people
• consult with the statutory, voluntary and business sectors to understand their needs and issues 
We will establish an effective Local Action Group that will provide a funding and coordination function fo

The project will focus upon the Inner-West areas of Leeds within the areas of highest deprivation.  Barca-Leeds will manage and lead the CLLD project in order to develop a Local Action Group and strategy. Barca is an established charity which is rooted in the West Leeds communities that it serves.
